translation: Now, behold, O Arjuna, in this My body, the entire universe centered in one, including the moving and the unmoving, and whatever else you desire to see.
commentary: 11.7 Ih in this? ekastham centered in one? Jagat the universe? The whole whole? See behold? Today now? moving with the moving and the unmoving? My My? Dehe in body? Gudakesh O Gudakesa? That whatever? f and? Otherwise other? to see to see? you want (thou) desirest.Commentary Other whatever else. Your success or defeat in the war? about which you,have entertained a doubt. (Cf.II.6)
